SharpMermaid
Table of Contents

Config Reference

Config notes

Important

All relative paths specified in config file are relative to the location of mermaidconfig.json

Root properties

{
  "SolutionPath": "./TestSolution.sln",
  "OutputDirectory": "./Diagrams",
  "FileType": ".mmd",
  "Diagrams": []
}

SolutionPath

Path to the solution file.

Type: string
Required: yes
Default: - Validation:

  • Must not be empty: "Error: SolutionPath is required"
  • Must end with .sln: "Error: SolutionPath must point to a .sln file"
  • Must be a valid file path (relative or absolute): "Error: SolutionPath is not a valid file path"

OutputDirectory

Output directory for all generated diagrams (overridable per diagram).

Type: string
Required: yes
Default: - Validation:

  • Must not be empty: "Error: OutputDirectory is required"
  • Must be a valid directory path: "Error: OutputDirectory is not a valid directory path"
  • Can be relative or absolute.

FileType

File type for all generated diagrams.

Type: string
Required: yes
Default: -
Supported: .mmd and .md Validation:

  • Must be either .mmd or .md: "Error: FileType must be either '.mmd' or '.md'"
  • Must start with a dot (.): "Error: FileType must begin with a dot"

Diagrams

An array of diagram configurations.
Each item must contain exactly one property,
where the key is the diagram type and the value is its specific configuration.

Type: array
Required: yes
Default: -
Supported diagram types: Validation:

  • Must not be empty: "Error: Diagrams must contain at least one item"
  • Each item must contain exactly one property: "Error: Each diagram entry must define exactly one diagram type"
  • Diagram type must be supported: "Error: Unsupported diagram type '{name}'"
  • PhysicalProject: Generates a physical project layout diagram.

Example:

{
  "Diagrams": [
    {
      "PhysicalProjectDiagram": {}
    }
  ] 
}

Physical Project Diagram

Generates a physical project layout diagram.

OutputDirectory

Overrides root output path for this diagram.

Type: string
Required: no
Default: Inherits from root OutputDirectory

Validation:

  • If provided, must be a valid directory path: "Error: OutputDirectory is not a valid directory path"

FileName

File name for the generated diagram

Type: string
Required: yes
Default: -
Validation:

  • Must not be empty: "Error: FileName is required"
  • Cannot contain invalid filename characters (\ / : * ? " < > |): "Error: FileName contains invalid characters"
  • Must not use file extension (use "FileName", not "FileName.mmd"): "Error: FileName must not have a file extension"

TopLevelPublicTypes

Include top-level public types in each project.

Type: boolean
Required: no
Default: false Validation:

  • Must be true or false (JSON boolean): "Error: TopLevelPublicTypes must be a boolean"

ClassDiagramLinks

Turn each project node in to a clickable link, that navigates to its class diagram.

Type: boolean
Required: no
Default: false Validation:

  • Must be true or false (JSON boolean): "Error: TopLevelPublicTypes must be a boolean"

BaseUrl

Base URL used to build class diagram links.

Type: string
Required: if ClassDiagramLinks is true
Default: - Validation

  • Required if Root/ClassDiagramLinks is true: "Error: BaseUrl is required when ClassDiagramLinks is enabled"
  • Must be a valid absolute URL (starts with http:// or https://): "Error: BaseUrl must be a valid absolute URL"

Physical Project Diagram Example:

{
  "Diagrams": [
    {
      "PhysicalProject": {
        "OutputDirectory": "./Override/Diagrams",
        "FileName": "PhysicalDiagram",
        "FileType": ".mmd",
        "TopLevelPublicTypes": true,
        "ClassDiagramLinks": true,
        "BaseUrl": "https://example.com/"
      }
    }
  ] 
}

Full Example Config Structure

{
  "SolutionPath": "./TestSolution.sln",
  "OutputDirectory": "./Diagrams",
  "FileType": ".mmd",
  "Diagrams": [
   {
     "PhysicalProject": {
        "OutputDirectory": "./Override/Diagrams",
        "FileName": "PhysicalDiagram",
        "FileType": ".mmd",
        "TopLevelPublicTypes": true,
        "ClassDiagramLinks": true,
        "BaseUrl": "https://example.com/"
     }
   }
  ]
}
